H0.text: By what name did Samuel Langhorne Clemens publish his novels under. Markston

H1.text: By what name did Samuel Langhorne Clemens publish his novels under. Langhorn

H2.text: By what name did Samuel Langhorne Clemens publish his novels under. Riverwood

H3.text: By what name did Samuel Langhorne Clemens publish his novels under. Twainian

A4.text: Samuel Langhorne Clemens published his novels under the pen name Mark Twain.

A5.text: Samuel Langhorne Clemens wrote his novels using the pseudonym Mark Twain.
